title: Python Backend Developer
description:
Responsibilities:

Design, develop, and maintain backend systems and APIs using Python (Django, FastAPI, Flask).

Build and expose robust RESTful or GraphQL endpoints for frontend and third-party integrations.

Design and optimize database schemas, write efficient queries, and ensure data integrity (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis).

Implement asynchronous tasks, message queues, or event-driven architectures when needed.

Ensure code quality through testing, reviews, and adherence to best practices.

Optimize backend performance, scalability, reliability, and security (caching, indexing, monitoring).

Collaborate with frontend, DevOps, QA, and product teams to translate business needs into technical solutions.

Manage version control (Git), CI/CD pipelines, containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), and cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP, Azure).

Troubleshoot and debug production issues; perform root-cause analysis and corrective actions.

Required Qualifications:

Bachelorâ€™s degree (or equivalent) in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.

5+ years of experience in Python development or a similar backend engineering role.

Strong proficiency in Python (3.x), object-oriented design, data structures, and algorithms.

Experience with one or more web frameworks (Django, FastAPI, Flask).

Solid experience with relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL) and ORM tools.

Familiarity with RESTful or GraphQL APIs and web protocols (HTTP, JSON).

Experience with Git, collaborative workflows, and CI/CD pipelines.

Demonstrated ability to write clean, maintainable, efficient, and well-tested code.

Strong communication and teamwork skills.
